title: Ayazın Sonu Güneş
overview: Güneş is a young woman who has just graduated from university and is preparing to go abroad to pursue her ideals. When Güneş's brother is imprisoned due to a false accusation, her path crosses with Ayaz, the heir to a large and prestigious holding. Fate tests the two young people through the lives of their loved ones, pushing Güneş to play a dangerous game to save her brother. However, the rules of this game will be disrupted by love. As Ayaz's heart, frozen in ice years ago, warms with Güneş's presence, life shows its ruthless face to them both without hesitation. In a journey woven with secrets and intrigues, Ayaz and Güneş fight battles where both their salvation and captivity will be love.
